text: "Montero (Call Me by Your Name)" is a song by American rapper and singer Lil Nas X. It was released on March 26, 2021. A longer version of the song, named "Satan's Extended Version", was released on March 29, 2021. The song became Lil Nas X's second number one song on the Billboard Hot 100 after "Old Town Road" (solo or with Billy Ray Cyrus). == Music video == A music video for the song was shot in two days in February 2021. It features Nas X himself in different biblical scenes. This also includes the artist stripteasing to Hell. The video for the song received complaints due to its content, depicting Lil Nas X twerking on a person dressed as Satan. Conservatives from the United States stated that the content of the video was "immoral" for children. ==References== Category:2021 songs Category:Lil Nas X songs
